title: Audio-Based Social Learning: Blended Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social science concepts and experience in using digital devices
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining audio content and online discussion platforms, where learners interact with audio lectures using personal devices (BYOD) and practice real-life applications in weekly face-to-face sessions

learning_goals: Learners can summarize key concepts of social change with 80% accuracy after listening to audio explanations.
Through audio-based case analysis, learners can propose three or more solutions to address community issues.
Learners demonstrate the ability to apply audio learning content by achieving 75% or higher on weekly formative assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
